_header: Leech o the lazars lawfully I-lened
Subjects: Christ, attributes of; sermons, verse in
_description: Christ the Physician — six alliterative lines in an English prose homily

WorcF10.Transcription:
Leche oþ þe lasours lawfulliche y lenydlouers in
                    lustlongyng be lithnes haþ ileridMayster of mayndenhede to mercy e
                    mendmen in mischif mornyng mekenes haþ ne menyd
WorcF10.Note:
4 allit. rhyming lines in an English prose homily; follows after prose
                    following 3293.
